headline: Assessing VeriSign (VRSN) Valuation As Recent Trading Puts Legal Risks In Focus
summary: Why VeriSign Is On Investors’ Radar Today VeriSign (VRSN) is back in focus after recent trading, with the stock last closing at US$227.94. Investors are weighing this price against the company’s current fundamentals and recent return profile. See our latest analysis for VeriSign. Recent trading has been choppy, with a 1 day share price return of 1.18% and a 7 day gain of 5.57% following a 30 day share price return of 6.67% and a year to date share price return of 5.23%.
